title.v: Thêm điều chỉnh dữ liệu chấm công

items.key: bp_ref like '{$%c[bp_ref]}%' and (@@admin = 1 or bo_phan in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)) and status = '1'
items.check: bp_ref like '{$%c[bp_ref]}%' and (@@admin = 1 or bo_phan in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID))

command.text: select 'this.setItemValue("bp_ref", this.grid._$dept); this.setReferenceKeyFilter("ma_nv");' as message return

&CheckLockedBeforeInsert; declare @q nvarchar(4000), @$exists nvarchar(512), @d char(8), @return int select @$exists = case when @@language = 'V' then N'Thông tin điều chỉnh giờ vào/ra cho nhân viên đang cập nhật đã được khai báo, không lưu được.' else N'This item already exists, it can not be saved.' end select @d = convert(char(8), @ngay, 112), @return = 0 select 1 as loai_dl, @stt_rec as stt_rec, @ngay as ngay, @gio_vao as gio_vao, @hs_vao as hs_vao, @gio_ra as gio_ra, @hs_ra as hs_ra, cast(left(@gio_vao, 2) as int) * 60 + cast(right(@gio_vao, 2) as int) + case when @hs_vao = 1 then 1440 else 0 end as gio0_vao, cast(convert(varchar(8), @ngay, 112) + ' ' + @gio_vao as datetime) + case when @hs_vao = 1 then 1 else 0 end as thoi_gian_vao, cast(left(@gio_ra, 2) as int) * 60 + cast(right(@gio_ra, 2) as int) + case when @hs_ra = 1 then 1440 else 0 end as gio0_ra, cast(convert(varchar(8), @ngay, 112) + ' ' + @gio_ra as datetime) + case when @hs_ra = 1 then 1 else 0 end as thoi_gian_ra, 0 as xoa_yn, @ghi_chu as ghi_chu into #tmp set @q = 'if exists (select 1 from hrdcdulieu$' + left(@d, 6) + ' a with(nolock) join #tmp b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay = b.ngay' set @q = @q + ' and ((a.gio_vao = b.gio_vao and a.hs_vao = b.hs_vao) or (a.gio_ra = b.gio_vao and a.hs_ra = b.hs_vao)' set @q = @q + ' or (a.gio_vao = b.gio_ra and a.hs_vao = b.hs_ra) or (a.gio_ra = b.gio_ra and a.hs_ra = b.hs_ra)' set @q = @q + ') where a.loai_dl = 1) begin' set @q = @q + char(13) + 'select @v = 1' + char(13) + 'return' + char(13) + 'end' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@v int output', @return output if @return = 1 begin select 'ngay' as field, @$exists as message return end set @q = 'insert into hrdcdulieu$' + left(@d, 6) + ' (loai_dl, stt_rec, ngay, gio_vao, hs_vao, gio_ra, hs_ra, gio0_vao, thoi_gian_vao, gio_vao0, ' set @q = @q + 'hs_vao0, thoi_gian_vao0, gio0_ra, thoi_gian_ra, gio_ra0, hs_ra0, thoi_gian_ra0, xoa_yn, ghi_chu, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2)' set @q = @q + ' select loai_dl, stt_rec, ngay, gio_vao, hs_vao, gio_ra, hs_ra, gio0_vao, thoi_gian_vao, '''', 0, null, ' set @q = @q + 'gio0_ra, thoi_gian_ra, '''', 0, null, xoa_yn, ghi_chu, getdate(), getdate(), @@userID, @@userID from #tmp' exec sp_executesql @q select '' as field, '' as message, 'insert$&Identity;Form$Retrieve$Data(this);' as script drop table #tmp return

action.text: if exists(select 1 from hrnv where ma_nv = @ma_nv) begin select stt_rec from hrnv where ma_nv = @ma_nv return end
